remarks: An associative law for division.  ( ~ divass analog.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
statement:
dvrass.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
dvrass.o $e |- U = ( Unit ` R ) $.
dvrass.d $e |- ./ = ( /r ` R ) $.
dvrass.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
dvrass $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. U ) ) -> ( ( X .x. Y ) ./ Z ) = ( X .x. ( Y ./ Z ) ) ) $.
